title: Long Covid Impacts Millions Worldwide
itunes:title: Long Covid Impacts Millions Worldwide
description:
Dr. Betty Raman, Principal Investigator for the Radcliffe Department of Medicine at the University of Oxford, discusses developing treatments for Covid long-haulers, as nearly a quarter of Covid survivors are estimated to suffer from the virus’s long-term effects. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Stephanie Flanders, Head of Bloomberg Economics, talk about the Businessweek Magazine cover story Central Banks, Not Covid, Will Drive Global Economies in 2022. Bloomberg News Real Estate Reporter Patrick Clark explains how fintech companies are working on an Amazon for housing. And we Drive to the Close with Aaron Kennon, CEO at Clear Harbor Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
